description:
Moroccan Amber Eau De Parfum - A Sensory Journey to North Africa

Experience the enchanting allure of Moroccan Amber, a luxurious oriental fragrance that transports you to the mystical bazaars of Marrakech. This exquisite amber perfume blends rich, resinous notes with exotic spices to create a warm, captivating scent that lingers beautifully on the skin. âœ¨

The Essence of Moroccan Amber

This 100ml Eau De Parfum captures the heart of Morocco with its amber-forward composition, creating an intoxicating aroma that evokes images of golden sunsets over desert landscapes and ancient medinas filled with treasures. The amber fragrance opens with vibrant top notes that gradually unfold into a rich, complex heart before settling into a warm, sensual base that lasts for hours. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Eau De Parfum
Concentration High (15-20%)
Brand Moroccan Amber

Fragrance Journey of Moroccan Amber EDP

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Bergamot, Saffron, Cardamom
Heart Notes Rose, Jasmine, Cinnamon
Base Notes Amber, Vanilla, Oud, Patchouli, Musk

Key Features of Moroccan Amber ðŸ’Ž

  • Long-lasting amber perfume with exceptional sillage
  • Luxurious blend of premium oud and amber accords
  • Elegant glass bottle with ornate Moroccan-inspired design
  • Perfect for evening wear and special occasions
  • Unisex fragrance suitable for all amber enthusiasts
  • Part of our best sellers collection

The Heritage of Moroccan Amber

Inspired by the ancient perfume traditions of North Africa, Moroccan Amber pays homage to the rich heritage of amber in perfumery. For centuries, amber has been treasured across Moroccan culture for its warm, comforting properties and status as a symbol of wealth and sophistication. This contemporary interpretation maintains the authentic character of traditional amber fragrances while adding modern complexity that appeals to today's discerning fragrance connoisseur. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Moroccan Amber Eau De Parfum last on skin?

Moroccan Amber is formulated with a high concentration of fragrance oils (15-20%), allowing it to last 8-10 hours on most skin types. The rich amber base notes create exceptional longevity, with many customers reporting that the scent remains detectable even after 12+ hours. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and layer with unscented lotion to help the fragrance adhere better to your skin. Many of our new arrival customers specifically praise this perfume for its remarkable staying power. ðŸ’«
